message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a new algorithm for virtual cinematography that involves controlling a virtual camera within a 360$^{\circ}$ video. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is also likely as the paper deals with creating a more immersive visual experience for viewers. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is another possible category as the paper deals with video content and proposes an algorithm for efficient video extraction. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is a possible category as the paper discusses the burden on viewers and proposes a solution for suboptimal viewing experiences. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible category as the paper proposes an algorithm for virtual cinematography that involves automated camera control.
